speaker: Bone Altar
lines: You find an altar set with old bone and hardened wax.
Melted tallow runs in lines down the stone.
A book wrapped in dark cloth rests at the back.
Three teeth sit in a saucer on the corner.
Coins line the edge of the altar.
You feel a pull to make a promise and keep it.
You decide what to leave and what to take.

choices.text: Pledge to carry the names that have no mouths.
Break the saucer and scatter the teeth.
Take the cloth-bound book and leave.
